CustomField.formula:
IF(AND (LEN( AWB__c ) < 18, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "UPS EXPRESS CRITICAL")), HYPERLINK("https://www.upsexpresscritical.com/cfw/tracking.screen", 'UPS Tracking Info'),
IF(AND (LEN( AWB__c ) = 18, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "UPS")), HYPERLINK("https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&tracknum="&AWB__c&"&requester=ST/", 'UPS Tracking Info'),
IF(AND (LEN( AWB__c ) <> 18, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "UPS")), HYPERLINK("https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=WT/", 'UPS Tracking Info'),
IF(AND (LEN(AWB__c ) = 12, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "FedEx")), HYPERLINK("https://www.fedex.com/apps/fedextrack/?action=track&trackingnumber="&AWB__c & "&cntry_code=us", 'FedEx Tracking Info'),
IF(AND (LEN(AWB__c ) <> 12, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "FedEx")), HYPERLINK("https://www.fedex.com/en-us/home.html", 'FedEx Tracking Info'),
IF(AND (LEN(AWB__c ) = 10, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "DHL")), HYPERLINK("http://www.dhl.com/en/express/tracking.html?AWB="&AWB__c & "&brand=DHL", 'DHL Tracking Info'), IF(AND (LEN(AWB__c ) <> 10, CONTAINS(TEXT(Carrier__c), "DHL")), HYPERLINK("http://www.dhl.com/en/express/tracking.html", 'DHL Tracking Info'),
IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Sterling Courier", HYPERLINK("http://sterling.quick.aero/tracking/", 'Sterling Courier Tracking Info'), NULL ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: AWB Link
